headline: A Look At Northrop Grumman (NOC) Valuation After New Japan Contract And Ongoing Growth Optimism
summary: Northrop Grumman (NOC) is back in focus after a new US$198 million contract to supply E-2D Advanced Hawkeye components to Japan, along with Army scrutiny over artillery delivery delays tied to Ukraine. See our latest analysis for Northrop Grumman. At a share price of US$698.02, Northrop Grumman has had a 12.8% 30 day share price return and a 24.97% 90 day share price return, while its 1 year total shareholder return of 49.87% and 5 year total shareholder return of 160.57% point to momentum...

headline: Northrop Grumman Faces Ukraine Penalties While Securing Key Japanese Contract
summary: US Army is seeking penalties from Northrop Grumman (NYSE:NOC) over delays in artillery ammunition deliveries for Ukraine. The delays relate to contracts for critical munitions at a time of heightened global defense demand. Separately, Northrop Grumman has secured a major contract to supply aircraft components to Japan. The combination of potential penalties and new international business is drawing fresh attention from investors and policy makers. Northrop Grumman, a large US defense...

headline: 3 Unpopular Stocks That Concern Us
summary: Wall Street’s bearish price targets for the stocks in this article signal serious concerns. Such forecasts are uncommon in an industry where maintaining cordial corporate relationships often trumps delivering the hard truth.
